==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Panjvahe is composed of Persian and Arabic words.
** {{Lang|''Panj''|fa=پنج}} is the Persian word for "five."
** {{Lang|''Vahe''|ar=واحه}} is the Arabic word for "oasis."
